name: Ancana
headline: Marketplace to buy managed vacation homes through fractional ownership
description:
With Ancana, you can own a 1/4 or 1/8 share of the home and split expenses with the other co-owners. If you buy a 1/4 share of a home, you have access to it for 3 months of the year. For each property we set up the investment trust, find qualified co-owners, and handle the entire real estate purchase transaction. Costs are split amongst the co-owners, and we take care of the furnishing and ongoing property management.

We accomplish this by creating an investment trust for each property and dividing it into individual, purchasable shares that represent ownership in the property. We furnish each home and find and vet the co-owners. Once all of the shares of the property are sold, we retain no ownership stake in the property and transition into the role of property manager, ensuring the home is well maintained and handling any issues that arise. Unlike a timeshare, Ancana owners own a real asset (the property) versus a block of time. If you decide you want to sell your share, you are free to do so at any time, either through us or on the open market, and capture any appreciation the property has accrued.

founders.name: Andres Barrios, Founder
founders.description:
Andres is a serial entrepreneur passionate about creating efficient real estate solutions to our ever growing population. He is an experienced founder that has demonstrated history of launching succesful tech startups in different industries and a real estate junky with more than 16 years of experience in acquisitions, property management, development and divestments.

Has an MBA from UT at Austin

The feeling of investing in your memories and your future. All under one roof.
Become an owner of your dream vacation home for only a fraction of the price.
[Explore properties](https://www.ancana.co/</listings>)
Learn more about fractional
How DOES the fractional model ACTUALLY WORK?
![Ancana Hero Img](https://www.ancana.co/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Ffractional-pie.gif&w=640&q=100)
Own part of the home, use it throughout the year! Rather than buying an entire home that you’ll only use a few times a year, **fractional ownership makes it possible to own a share of a luxury home and enjoy it on your schedule.** Each home is professionally managed and comes with luxury amenities, so you can spend your vacation creating memories with those that matter most
Want to learn more about this?
Watch video
WHY YOU SHOULd BUY YOUR HOME WITH ANCANA
The Smart Way to own and enjoy your vacation home (Without all the headaches)
With Ancana you can own the home you have been dreaming about for a fraction of the cost, today!
Invest in your future
You can’t put a price on memories, but you can own equity in a luxury home. If you decide to sell your fraction, the gains are yours to keep!
Peace of mind
We handle all the cleaning and manteinance so you can focus on why you bought home in the first place: to relax and make memories with your family and friends!
Flexibility for your schedule 
Use the home on the dates that matter most to you. Can’t use all of your weeks? Rent them and keep the proceeds.
TRENDING HOMES
DISCOVER OUR DESTINATIONS
Ancana has homes Mexico's best destinations: Cities with historical heritage, beaches, forests, lakes, or mountains. Let us help you find your dream vacation home!
Embrace home ownership with Ancana
Use
Experience the ultimate in personalized vacation experiences and create unforgettable memories in your own piece of paradise. With Ancana, you have the freedom to enjoy your property whenever you desire. Whether it's a summer getaway, a winter retreat, or a special occasion celebration with family and friends, your vacation home is yours to use at your leisure.
Rent
With Ancana's effortless rental program say goodbye to the hassle of managing rentals yourself – Ancana handles everything for you. From finding guests to managing bookings and ensuring a seamless experience for both you and your renters, Ancana takes care of it all. Sit back, relax, and let your property generate rental income worry-free while you reap the rewards.
Swap
Explore a global experience with Ancana, in partnership with ThirdHome. Whether you dream of a beachfront villa in Monaco, a mountain chalet in New Zealand, or a penthouse in New York, we provide access to over 15,000 luxury properties in more than 120 countries. With Ancana, luxury home exchange is seamless, allowing you to discover new destinations without the hassle of accommodation costs.
![](https://d2zefcg3wq59mt.cloudfront.net/home/thirdhome-white.png)
![](https://d2zefcg3wq59mt.cloudfront.net/home/thirdhome.png)
¡SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER!
I accept the Terms in Ancana's Privacy Policy and agree to be contacted via email, phone, and WhatsApp
Connect
WHAT OUR OWNERS SAY
They answered each of my questions in detail. The process was easy and highly informative; I never felt left in the dark. The buying process went really smoothly. The house was everything we had hoped for and more! Our kids couldn't believe it. I envision this as a lifestyle for the rest of our lives. It makes a big difference to own an asset rather than just 'the right to use it.
- Francis, Bolongo Owner
This is a way of owning in the short term without having to wait for years to save up for a complete property. We always wanted a place that was truly ours, and it's doubly satisfying to enjoy the house without having to negotiate a second mortgage. Now we have a place to create memories with our children and the freedom to travel without worrying about our second home. The idea of ownership is important, and it feels good to say, 'I own a place here.' It's real, and it feels good. 
For us, it was the best investment, with greater pride. It's a smarter investment, and I feel prouder of being an owner. There's a different sense of ownership when you're part of something formally and legally, compared to just visiting it once or twice a year. Open your mind to the idea that this can become a reality. You can have true ownership, and it can be a place that will surprise you and become your second home."
Let's find the vacation home of your dreams together!
One of our expert advisors will contact you to provide you with detailed information about the properties and answer your questions.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Ancana**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S21, Ancana is transforming the way we think about vacation ownership. Based in Mérida, Mexico, this innovative company offers a marketplace for fractional ownership of managed vacation homes. With a small but dedicated team of seven, Ancana is spearheaded by Aaron Epstein as their Group Partner.

**Mission and Business Model**

The mission of Ancana is straightforward yet impactful: to make vacation home ownership accessible and hassle-free. Unlike traditional models like timeshares, where you buy the right to use a property, Ancana allows individuals to purchase 1/4 or 1/8 shares of a luxury vacation home. This means if you own a 1/4 share, you can enjoy the home for three months of the year.

Here's how it works:

1. **Investment Trust Creation**: For each property, Ancana sets up an investment trust, dividing the home into shares that can be purchased by qualified co-owners.
2. **Co-Owner Management**: They facilitate the entire purchasing process, connect like-minded co-owners, and handle the furnishing and ongoing management of the property.
3. **Ownership and Flexibility**: Once all shares are sold, Ancana transitions to a property management role, leaving co-owners with actual asset ownership. Owners can sell their shares whenever they want, reaping any appreciation the property may have gained.

**Key Benefits**

- **Real Asset Ownership**: Owners are investing in a tangible asset rather than just a block of time.
- **Effective Management**: Ancana manages all upkeep and cleaning, allowing owners to focus on relaxation and creating memories.
- **Flexible Usage**: Owners can use their home on their terms and even rent out unused weeks to earn income.

**Current Offerings**

Ancana provides access to luxury homes across various stunning destinations in Mexico, catering to different tastes—be it historical cities, tropical beaches, or serene mountains. They also offer a rental program and opportunities for global property exchanges through partnerships, further enhancing the experience for their co-owners.

**Looking Ahead**

As Ancana continues to grow, they are focused on expanding their offerings and helping more people embrace the joys of ownership without the complexities typically associated with second homes. With a clear vision and an innovative model, Ancana is poised to redefine vacation home ownership for the modern traveler.

For anyone interested in exploring these unique opportunities, feel free to check out their website at [Ancana.co](https://www.ancana.co).
